#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<vector>
#define PB push_back
#define INF 1000000007
int min(int x,int y)
{
    if(x<y) return x;
    return y;
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    //freopen("input_knp3.txt", "r", stdin);
    string t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t!="TheEnd")
    {
        cout<<t<<endl;
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        string name[n+1];
        int a[n+1][n+1][m+2], mi[n+1][m+2], co[n+1][m+2], cost[n+1][m+2];
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            cin>>name[i];
            for(int j=1;j<=m;j++)
            cin>>cost[i][j];
        }
        for(int i=0;i<=n;i++)
        for(int j=0;j<=n;j++)
        for(int k =0 ;k<=m+1;k++)
        {
            a[i][j][k] = INF;
        co[j][k] = INF;
        }

        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
        a[i][j][0] = 0;

        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)

            {
                a[i][j][1] = cost[j][1];
                co[j][1] = a[i][j][1];
             }
        for(int k =2 ;k<=m;k++)
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
            {
                if(i == j)
                {
                    a[i][j][k] = co[i][k-1];
                    co[j][k] = min(a[i][j][k],co[j][k]);
                    if(a[i][j][k] == co[j][k]) mi[j][k] = i;
                }
                else{
                    a[i][j][k] = co[i][k-1] + cost[j][k] -(cost[i][k]-100);
                    co[j][k] = min(a[i][j][k],co[j][k]);
                    if(a[i][j][k] == co[j][k]) mi[j][k] = i;
                }
            }

        }
        //cout<<a[1][1][3]<<endl;
        int ans = INF;
        int u = 0;
        for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
        {
            ans = min(ans,co[j][m]);
            if(ans == co[j][m]) u = j;
        }
        cout<<"Tk ";//<<
        cout<<ans<<endl;
        vector<int> v;
        v.push_back(u);
        while(m!=0)
        {
            v.PB(mi[u][m]);
            u = mi[u][m];
            m--;
        }
        int si = v.size();
        int y = 1;
        for(int i = si-2;i>=0;i--)
        {
            if(i>=1 && v[i] == v[i-1]) {y++;continue;}
            cout<<name[v[i]]<<" for "<<y<<" month(s)"<<endl;
            y=1;
        }
        cout<<endl;
        cin>>t;
    }
    cout<<"TheEnd"<<endl;
    return 0;
}
